biotools.summary: DSaaS (Data Science as a Service) is an easy-to-use cloud platform well suited for hospital structures, where healthcare operators might not have specific competences in using programming languages but still, they do need to analyze data as a continuous process. It is able to predict patients risk to contract a multidrug resistant urinary tract infection (MDR UTI) after hospitalization.
